Below is a collection of blogposts or other documents that talk about different
functions included in `ggstatsplot`.

  - <https://djnavarro.net/post/data-summaries-with-ggstatsplot/>

  - <https://paulvanderlaken.com/2018/08/26/ggstatsplot-creating-graphics-including-statistical-details/>

  - <https://www.r-bloggers.com/how-to-remove-outliers-in-r/>
